/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a moment on a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with lush green trees and towering buildings, creating a harmonious blend of nature and architecture. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds, adding a serene backdrop to the urban landscape. Cars and bicycles are scattered along the street, hinting at the city's vibrant transportation system. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of being in the midst of the action. The colors in the image are vibrant and varied, reflecting the lively atmosphere of the city.
